abstract: A reporter for MarketWatch resigned Friday after published reports suggested a Web site she started on her own might have created a conflict of interest.
snippet: A reporter for MarketWatch resigned Friday after published reports suggested a Web site she started on her own might have created a conflict of interest.
lead_paragraph: A reporter for MarketWatch, an online business news site owned by Dow Jones, resigned yesterday after published reports suggested that a Web site she started on her own might have created a conflict of interest.

headline.main: Reporter at Dow Jones Online Site Resigns Over Web Venture
headline.print_headline: Reporter at Dow Jones Online Site Resigns Over Web Venture
